00036     // with this information and transmits resultant frame to lower layer

00069                 frame->setByteLength(ETHER_MAC_FRAME_BYTES);
00070                 frame->setName(msg->getName());
00071                 frame->setDest(etherctrl->getDest());

00074

00076                 if (frame->getByteLength() < MIN_ETHERNET_FRAME)

void EtherEncapVlans::registerVlanInterfaces ( double  txrate  )  [protected] 

00159                                                          {
00160 
00161         IInterfaceTable *ift = InterfaceTableAccess().getIfExists();
00162         if (!ift)
00163                 return;
00164 
00165 
00166         cStringTokenizer tok(par("vlans").stringValue());
00167         vector<string> vlans = tok.asVector();
00168 
00169         for (unsigned int i=0; i<vlans.size(); i++){
00170 
00171 
00172                 InterfaceEntry *interfaceEntry = new InterfaceEntry();
00173 
00174                 // interface name: our module name without special characters ([])
00175                 // +5 for the vlan .[0-4096]
00176                 char *interfaceName = new char[strlen(getParentModule()->getFullName())+1+5];
00177                 char *d=interfaceName;
00178                 for (const char *s=getParentModule()->getFullName(); *s; s++)
00179                         if (isalnum(*s))
00180                                 *d++ = *s;
00181                 *d++ = '.';
00182                 for (unsigned int c=0; c<vlans[i].length(); c++)
00183                         *d++ = vlans[i][c];
00184 
00185                 *d = '\0';
00186 
00187                 interfaceEntry->setName(interfaceName);
00188                 delete [] interfaceName;
00189 
00190                 // data rate
00191                 interfaceEntry->setDatarate(txrate);
00192 
00193                 // generate a link-layer address to be used as interface token for IPv6
00194                 MACAddress addr = MACAddress::generateAutoAddress();
00195                 interfaceEntry->setMACAddress(addr);
00196                 interfaceEntry->setInterfaceToken(addr.formInterfaceIdentifier());
00197 
00198                 // Store mac per vlan interface to do encap later
00199                 vmacs[atoi(vlans[i].c_str())] = addr;
00200 
00201 
00202                 // MTU: typical values are 576 (Internet de facto), 1500 (Ethernet-friendly),
00203                 // 4000 (on some point-to-point links), 4470 (Cisco routers default, FDDI compatible)
00204                 interfaceEntry->setMtu(1500);
00205 
00206                 // capabilities
00207                 interfaceEntry->setMulticast(true);
00208                 interfaceEntry->setBroadcast(true);
00209 
00210                 // add
00211                 ift->addInterface(interfaceEntry, this);
00212         }
00213 }
